citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At 1130 am, this facility did not have a responsible adult present so an animal welfare inspection could be conducted.
The phone number on file was called by the inspector and a message was left. Inspector waited for 45 minutes before
leaving facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At 1130 am, this facility did not have a responsible adult present so an animal welfare inspection could be conducted.  
The phone number on file was called by the inspector and a message was left.  Inspector waited for 45 minutes before 
leaving facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
